SBT prototype for Lift 2.1-SNAPSHOT available
Download tarball and zip versions

Lift 2.0 Released!
2010/06/30 -- Lift 2.0 is generally available today

p.a: Lift's David Pollak interviewed on Twit.tv FLOSS channel

div.p:
Lift 2.0 Milestone 5 available
2010/05/05 - Lift is evolving toward its 2.0 release (currently schedule for July, 2010.) Check out the latest milestone release, M5. And, yes, it's production ready.

Xerox uses Scala and Lift Lift 1.0 Released!
2009/02/26 - After months of development, we're proud to announce the release of Lift 1.0.

Jump right in!
Ramp up quickly with our Getting Started Guide

Lift Book
New! If you're looking for a deeper dive, have a look at the The Definitive guide to Lift book from APress.
